name: INFocusStatusAuthorizationStatus
desc: A constant that indicates whether your app has authorization to access the user’s focus status.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The user hasn’t chosen whether to grant your app access to their focus status yet.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: A restriction prevents your app from accessing the user’s focus status.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: The user has denied your app access to their focus status.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: Your app has authorization to access the user’s focus status.
